data: Based on Amcor's quick ratio, bid size, and cash conversion efficiency ratio over the past 6 months, should I invest in it?

Company: Amcor plc Indicators: Quick Ratio (Related Indicators: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Marketable Securities, Accounts Receivable, Current Liabilities); Bid Size (Related Indicators: Number of Shares, Multiple Buy Quotes, Market Depth, Order Book); Cash Conversion Efficiency Ratio (Related Indicators: Cash Flow from Operating Activities, Net Profit) Date: Past 6 months
Outline Adobe and its competitors' sales revenue and economic value added for September 2018.

Company: Adobe Inc.; Adobe Inc. Peers Indicators: Sales Revenue (Related Indicators: Total Revenue); Economic Value Added (Related Indicators: Net Operating Profit After Tax (NOPAT), Cost of Capital) Date: September 2018
(Adobe Inc.; Adobe Inc. Peers) (Sales Revenue; Total Revenue; Economic Value Added; Net Operating Profit After Tax (NOPAT); Cost of Capital) (1/9/2018 - 30/9/2018)

How did the average return on assets and return on operating capital for Halliburton Co. and other energy sector companies compare to their gross margin and average fixed asset cash return from April 2016 to July 2017?

Company: Halliburton Co.; Energy Companies Indicators: Average Return on Assets (Related Indicators: Net Profit, Average Total Assets); Return on Operating Capital (Related Indicators: Net Profit, Operating Capital); Gross Margin (Related Indicators: Revenue, Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)); Average Fixed Asset Cash Return (Related Indicators: Operating Cash Flow, Average Fixed Assets) Date: From April 2016 to July 2017

(Halliburton Co.; Energy Companies) (Average Return on Assets; Net Profit; Average Total Assets; Return on Operating Capital; Net Profit; Operating Capital; Gross Margin; Revenue; Cost of Goods Sold (COGS); Average Fixed Asset Cash Return; Operating Cash Flow; Average Fixed Assets) (1/4/2016 - 1/7/2017)
